summary: A top-performing student with an excellent academic record, a well-balanced skill set, and valuable industry experience, seeking employment with an ambitious organization to contribute to its growth while further enhancing my skills.

projects.title: SuperMarket Management System
projects.description: Developed a C++ Inventory Management System with a user-friendly interface, enabling administrators to add, edit, and remove products, and allowing buyers to view product lists and generate receipts. The system ensures data integrity through robust file handling and object-oriented programming principles.

projects.title: Student Management System
projects.description: Developed a C++ Student Management System with a user-friendly interface to manage student records, including name, contact, place, state, and roll number. This project showcases my proficiency in C++ programming, user input handling, and designing intuitive interfaces with robust data operations and integrity.

projects.title: Traffic Simulation Project
projects.description: Developed a simulation project using SUMO to analyze traffic congestion on roads. Integrated a web frontend for user inputs and displayed simulation results assessing traffic conditions based on various parameters.

assessments_certifications.title: CodeFest
assessments_certifications.description: A two-round codathon hosted by NSCC SRM, Department of Networking and Communications, School of Computing. This event was held on 1st and 2nd August at SRM IST Chennai.

assessments_certifications.title: AWS Certified Machine Learning certification
assessments_certifications.description: Achieved the AWS Certified Machine Learning â€“ Specialty certification, demonstrating proficiency in designing, implementing, deploying, and maintaining machine learning solutions on the AWS platform. This certification validates expertise in data engineering, exploratory data analysis, model building, training, and deployment using Amazon SageMaker, as well as ensuring performance, scalability, and security in machine learning operations with AWS services such as AWS Glue, Amazon S3, Amazon Redshift, and AWS Lambda. It showcases the ability to apply machine learning principles and AWS best practices to effectively solve real-world business problems.

assessments_certifications.title: Cisco Certified CyberOps Associate certification
assessments_certifications.description: Earned the Cisco Certified CyberOps Associate certification, demonstrating knowledge and skills in cybersecurity operations and procedures. This certification validates expertise in monitoring, detecting, analyzing, and responding to cybersecurity threats using various tools and technologies. It covers fundamental concepts in security monitoring, network intrusion analysis, incident response, and cybersecurity operations. The certification also highlights proficiency in using Cisco's security products and solutions to protect and secure network infrastructure, ensuring the ability to contribute effectively to cybersecurity operations and support in a professional environment.

assessments_certifications.title: Oracle Foundations Associate certification
assessments_certifications.description: Achieved the Oracle Foundations Associate certification, demonstrating a solid understanding of core Oracle technologies and concepts. This certification validates foundational knowledge in areas such as databases, cloud infrastructure, software development, and data management. It covers essential skills in navigating Oracle environments, understanding basic database architecture, and utilizing Oracle Cloud services. The certification showcases the ability to grasp key principles of Oracle technology and apply them effectively in entry-level technical roles or further advanced Oracle certifications.
